sentences.en: They collectively decided to recognize the changed situation.
sentences.cn: 他们集体决定承认局势的变化。

sentences.en: Painting sculpture architecture etc. are collectively called the "fine arts" or "plastic arts".
sentences.cn: 绘画、雕塑、建筑等统称为造型艺术。

sentences.en: Before we collectively tear our hair out—how are we supposed to find our way in a landscape this confusing?
sentences.cn: 在我们集体抓狂之前——我们该如何在这片混乱的土地上找到自己的路呢？
